io.github.goodees.ese.core.matching

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.goodees.ese.core.matching.RequestHandler

  • public class RequestHandler
extends Object
    Special kind of type switch, which maps to CompletionStage<RS> for many different subclasses of Request<RS>, all with different response types.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RequestHandler.Builder
      Builder for request handler.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultUnsupportedRequestHandler

        public static Exception defaultUnsupportedRequestHandler(Request<?> request)
        Default request handler that completes exceptionally with UnsupportedOperationException.
        Parameters:
        request - unmatched request
        Returns:
        UnsupportedOperationException describing that the request is not supported

      • throwingException

        public static <U> CompletionStage<U> throwingException(Exception e)
        Helper class for returning completion stage that completed exceptionally
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of response
        Parameters:
        e - exception to complete with
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture that completed exceptionally.

      • handle

        public <R extends Request<Response>,Response> CompletionStage<Response> handle(R request)
        Match the request against all the matches and return the result, or null if none matched.
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of request
        Response - type of response
        Parameters:
        request - request to match against
        Returns:
        completion stage corresponding to the response or null if nothing matched.

      • withDefaultFallback

        public static RequestHandler.Builder withDefaultFallback()
        Create builder, that handles unmatched request with defaultUnsupportedRequestHandler(Request) }
        Returns:
        a builder

      • withFallbackException

        public static RequestHandler.Builder withFallbackException(java.util.function.Function<Request<?>,Exception> unsupportedRequestHandler)
        Create a builder, that uses custom fallback exception mapper.
        Parameters:
        unsupportedRequestHandler - a mapper for an exception given the request
        Returns:
        a builder
